info.description: API to manage International Bank Account Number (IBAN) related services. The IBAN consists of up to 34 alphanumeric characters comprising a country code; two check digits; and a number that includes the domestic bank account number, branch identifier, and potential routing information. IBAN example: GB29HBUK40972924681012
info.title: International Bank Account Number (IBAN)

get.summary: Retrieves the BIC code for the requested IBAN
get.description: Retrieves the Bank Identifier Code (BIC) for the requested IBAN. The BIC is the SWIFT Address assigned to a bank in order to send automated payments to the banks concerned. It uniquely identifies the name and country of the bank.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

get.summary: Retrieves the components of the requested IBAN
get.description: Retrieves the components of the requested IBAN such as country code, checksum, bank identifier, branch identifier, account number and length

get.description: Retrieves the IBAN for a given Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN) and country code. The BBAN can be up to 30 alphanumeric characters that are country-specific. The BBAN is the last part of the IBAN when used for international funds transfers.

parameters.name: countryId
parameters.description: ISO country code of the financial institution.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

get.description: Retrieves the IBAN number generated based on the given components such as country code, account identifier, bank identifier and branch identifier

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

bicId.description: Bank Identifier Code (BIC) of the Beneficiary bank.

bankName.description: The name of the bank being referred to.

country.description: Identifies the country of the customer.

city.description: City address stated on driver licence or utlility bill. For example London, New York etc.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

iban.description: International Bank Account number, an identifier of the account. E.g. GB29 NWBK 6016 1331 9268 19

countryId.description: ISO country code of the financial institution.

checksum.description: Contains the checksum extracted from the IBAN

bankId.description: Contains the identifier of the bank with which the transaction is performed

branchId.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of a branch of a financial institution.

accountNumber.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

ibanLength.description: Contains the length of the IBAN

iban.description: International Bank Account number, an identifier of the account. E.g. GB29 NWBK 6016 1331 9268 19
International Bank Account number, an identifier of the account. E.g. GB29 NWBK 6016 1331 9268 19

countryCodePosition.description: Indicates the start position of the country code in the IBAN

countryCodeLength.description: Indicates the number of characters of the country code in the IBAN

checkDigitsPosition.description: Indicates the start position of check digits in the IBAN

checkDigitsLength.description: Indicates the number of check digits in the IBAN

bankIdentifierPosition.description: Indicates the start position of bank identifier in the IBAN

bankIdentifierLength.description: Indicates the number of characters of bank identifier in the IBAN

branchIdentifierPosition.description: Indicates the start position of the branch identifier in the IBAN (value is empty if the branch identifier is not applied in the country's IBAN format).

branchIdentifierLength.description: Indicates the number of characters of the branch identifier in the IBAN (value is 0 if the branch identifier is not applied in the country's IBAN format)

nationalIdLength.description: Indicates the number of significant characters of the National ID value that are used by SWIFT to populate the IBAN NATIONAL ID and that are sufficient to derive the IBAN BIC correctly.

accountNumberPosition.description: Indicates the start position of the account number in the IBAN

accountNumberLength.description: Indicates the number of characters of the account number in the IBAN

totalLength.description: Indicates the total number of characters in the IBAN

sepaMember.description: Indicates whether the IBAN is used in one of the SEPA schemes, Y - if it does; N - if it does not

optionalCommenceDate.description: The date from which the IBAN can start being used in customer credit payments, in the format YYYYMMDD

mandatoryCommenceDate.description: The date from which the IBAN must be used in customer credit payments, in the format YYYYMMDD

iban.description: International Bank Account number, an identifier of the account. E.g. GB29 NWBK 6016 1331 9268 19

isIBANValid.description: Indicates the IBAN was validated.Contains true if the IBAN is valid.
